description.en: FITA Crackers are SUPER delicious! This fancy cloak increases your Run Speed by +5%, Defense Power by +100, and Attack Power by +150
description.ar: FITA Crackers are SUPER delicious! This fancy cloak increases your Run Speed by +5%, Defense Power by +100, and Attack Power by +150
description.cns: FITA饼干非常美味！这件奇特的披风增加你的奔跑速度+5%，防御力+100，攻击力+150
description.de: Erhöht die Geschwindigkeit um 5%, die Abwehr um 100 und die Angriffskraft um 150
description.fi: FITA Crackers are SUPER delicious! This fancy cloak increases your Run Speed by +5%, Defense Power by +100, and Attack Power by +150
description.fil: FITA Crackers are SUPER delicious! This fancy cloak increases your Run Speed by +5%, Defense Power by +100, and Attack Power by +150
description.fr: FITA Crackers are SUPER delicious! This fancy cloak increases your Run Speed by +5%, Defense Power by +100, and Attack Power by +150
description.id: Kerupuk FITA SUPER enak! Jubah mewah ini meningkatkan Run Speed sebesar +5%, Defense Power sebesar +100, dan Attack Power sebesar +150
description.it: FITA Crackers are SUPER delicious! This fancy cloak increases your Run Speed by +5%, Defense Power by +100, and Attack Power by +150
description.jp: FITAクラッカーは超美味しいです！スピード+5%、防御力+100、攻撃力+150上昇する品の高いマント。
description.kr: FITA 크래커는 매우 맛있습니다! 이 멋진 망토는 달리기 속도 +5%, 방어력 +100, 공격력 +150을 증가시킵니다.
description.nl: FITA Crackers are SUPER delicious! This fancy cloak increases your Run Speed by +5%, Defense Power by +100, and Attack Power by +150
description.pl: FITA Crackers are SUPER delicious! This fancy cloak increases your Run Speed by +5%, Defense Power by +100, and Attack Power by +150
description.ru: Печенье FITA такое вкусное - устоять невозможно! Этот красивый плащ повышает скорость бега на 5%, показатель защиты - на 100, а силу атаки - на 150.
description.sp: ¡Las galletas FITA son SÚPER deliciosas! Esta elegante capa aumenta tu Velocidad de Movimiento +5%, el Poder de Defensa en +100 y el Poder de Ataque en +150.
description.sw: FITA Crackers are SUPER delicious! This fancy cloak increases your Run Speed by +5%, Defense Power by +100, and Attack Power by +150
description.th: FITA แครกเกอร์อร่อยมาก! เสื้อคลุมแฟนซีนี้เพิ่มความเร็วในการวิ่งของคุณ +5% พลังป้องกัน +100 และพลังโจมตี +150
description.tw: FITA餅乾超好吃，這件斗篷讓你移動速度+5%，防禦力+100，攻擊力+150
description.vi: FITA Crackers là SIÊU ngon! Chiếc áo choàng lạ mắt này tăng Tốc độ chạy của bạn lên + 5%, Sức mạnh phòng thủ lên +100 và Sức mạnh tấn công lên +150
